Why LLMs Need a New Web Framework

Featured

Traditional web frameworks were designed for humans typing code. But what happens when AI generates 90% of the code? We need frameworks optimized for token efficiency.

Current frameworks like Next.js require hundreds of tokens just for boilerplate — imports, config, JSX syntax. Snap reduces a typical page from 500+ tokens to under 100.
